convertBinaryToNum(String, int) - Method in class UPCAdecoder
This method takes the string of the binary code and the place where the code lies in the original barcode and uses that information to call a recursive algorithm that converts the string into the original int

A recursive algorithm that searches through the postnetcode to find the number that matches the binary string given.

convertToBinary(String) - Method in class PostNetEncoder
Returns the whole string for a whole number That takes a string of input numbers and class convertNumToBinary to return a whole string of binary inputs.

This method uses Java Regex to return the zip to the original format
convertToProductCode(String) - Method in class UPCAdecoder
This method converts the barcode into the original product code by breaking up the barcode into strings and converting those strings into the correct number
convertZip(String) - Method in class PostNetEncoder
This method takes a zip and uses the convertAnyZip,checksum, convertToBinary, and createBarCode to return the final barcode.
